Title: CodeIn
Description: CodeIn is an experimental source-to-source High-Level Synthesis (HLS) environment. It aims at supporting a part of the SystemC specification, and outputs VHDL code from it. It is developped in C#/WPF (.NET 4.0).
HomeWiki:
CodeIn Project

Short description

CodeIn is an experimental source-to-source High-Level Synthesis (HLS) environment.
It aims at supporting a part of the SystemC specification, and outputs VHDL code from it.
This project is starting from scratch and as such cannot be considered usable for now.
It is developped in C#/WPF (.NET 4.0).
More to come in the future...
